Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO WAYS AND MEANS

Title: Authorizes occupancy taxes in the city of Utica and the city of Rome
Summary: Authorizes occupancy taxes in the city of Utica and the city of Rome not to exceed 3%.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to authorizing occupancy taxes in the city of Utica and the city of Rome; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
